synopsis.text: Despite being a typical high school student, Hinowa Tomari's life takes an unexpected turn when he is chosen to become the spouse of an enigmatic, fluffy entity named Kanenogi. Initially taken aback, Tomari and his unusual partner embark on a shared journey of marital bliss that defies expectations. Witness the heartwarming and delightful adventures of this extraordinary couple as they navigate through the ups and downs of their unconventional married life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
